title: Kazakhstan v Wales: World Cup 2026 qualifier – live
summary: Wales is looking to build on their positive start under coach Craig Bellamy during an upcoming match following a long journey to Astana. Barry Glendenning will provide a minute-by-minute update on the game. Fans are eager to see if Wales can maintain their momentum.

title: Macron says ‘Coalition of the Willing’ will finalise ‘robust’ Ukrainian security guarantees – Europe live
summary: Leaders meeting in Paris are set to address Donald Trump this afternoon. The discussions may focus on various global issues and diplomatic relations. This meeting highlights ongoing conversations involving key international figures.

title: England v South Africa: second men’s one-day international – live
summary: England looks to recover from a heavy defeat in the first ODI as they take on South Africa at Lord's. The match presents an opportunity for England to regroup and showcase their capabilities. Writers will provide live over-by-over updates on the game's progress.

title: This is a disaster unfolding in plain sight. Each day Keir Starmer is smoothing Nigel Farage’s path to No 10 | Owen Jones
summary: Owen Jones, a columnist for The Guardian, warns that Labour's alignment with Reform's viewpoints is a significant error. He believes that this strategy only serves to empower Reform's position. Jones emphasizes the importance of distinct messaging for Labour's success.

title: RFK Jr defends chaos at federal health agencies as Democratic senators attack his ‘disaster’ tenure – live updates
summary: Trump's health secretary is under pressure as he faces challenging questions regarding department layoffs and budget cuts. Critics are scrutinizing his strategies aimed at 'making America healthy again.' The controversy highlights concerns about the impact of these measures on public health initiatives.
